info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 4:31PM EDT until June 16 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM EDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL MECKLENBURG COUNTY... At 431 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Boydton, or 13 miles northwest of Warrenton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... John H Kerr Dam, Eppes Fork, Keats, Palmer Springs, John H Kerr Reservoir and Lake Gaston. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
